ai-patthana8.44:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.44:0.3_0: don’t change in weather, mind, and the contemplating stem from disorders of bile.
ai-patthana8.44:1.1_0: Neither mental disctording mind, phlegm, wind, sun, and revolves.
ai-patthana8.44:2.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
